item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's on Thursdays.  An emcee will read a variety of questions on a number of topics. Each team submits an answer, bidding a certain number of points each time, depending on confidence level.( I.e., if your team members are really sure of an answer, they will bid maximum amount of points.) The team with the most points, wins. Chuck's serves appetizers, beer, burgers, steak, etc.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a little meetup sign. Plus, closer to the event I will give out my cell phone number
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's
